title: New Feature Updates: YouTube Keywords and More | Similarweb
description: Feature release highlights for July are in. Find out how they will help you and where you can access them on Similarweb. Read on now!
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesMeet Digital Marketing Intelligence’s Fresh Features – July 2021 Updates Meet Digital Marketing Intelligence’s Fresh Features – July 2021 See for Yourself by Owen Badham , Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb 2 Min. July 21, 2021 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Looking for the best topics to drive traffic to your videos or ways to land better referral sites? We have key updates for you (and more). Welcome to our monthly update on all the feature developments for the Digital Marketing Intelligence solution. Read on to get the latest. Keyword Generator: Making it Big on YouTube It’s no secret that YouTube’s home to countless how-to videos, vlogs, and product reviews. But you may not realize it’s the second-biggest search engine. Digital marketers, it’s never been more important to maximize the impact of your video content. And now we’ve added on-site YouTube data to the Keyword Generator, so you can find the best keywords and topics to optimize your videos. Simply enter a term and get phrase match plus related keywords, including on-site search volume, volume trend, clicks, and top country. Check out our YouTube Keyword Tool now. Boolean search: Partner up Finding potential referral and affiliate partners can feel like a full-time job. To give you time back, we’ve made pinpointing the domains that drive the highest-quality traffic to your website easier. Quickly filter through the long list of referral domain results in the Incoming Traffic pages and Competitor Affiliate results pages by using a boolean search. Exclude or include keywords to find the relevant referring sites that matter the most to your partner strategy. See boolean search in action. In-App Help: Click for support With so many functions and features available to help you grow your traffic, remembering what does what can be tough. Well, fear not – now you can quickly see what each Similarweb feature helps you do, through our new help bar that’s front and center across the entire platform. Get access to our knowledge center articles, videos, or product tours with a click. Once collapsed, the help icon is always there so you can always get help when you need it. Side note: we think this is awesome. See it in action here. Happy learning! Your amazing feedback helps us prioritize which features to develop next. Have any thoughts on our latest updates or features you’d like to see? Get in touch via our Live Chat, Social, or through your Account Manager. Thanks for reading. See you next month. by Owen Badham Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb A product marketer with 10+ years in SaaS, specializing in product launches, GTM strategy, and collateral production.
